metadata.name: HackTool - Certipy Execution
metadata.comment: Detects Certipy execution, a tool for Active Directory Certificate Services enumeration and abuse based on PE metadata characteristics and common command line arguments.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\certipy.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('certipy.exe') AND contains(lower(device.desc), lower('certipy')) OR (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' account ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' auth ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' cert ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' find ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' forge ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' ptt ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' relay ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' req ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' shadow ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' template '))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -bloodhound')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -ca-pfx ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -dc-ip ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -kirbi')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -old-bloodhound')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -pfx ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -target')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -template')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -username ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -vulnerable')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('auth -pfx')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('shadow auto')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('shadow list')))))

output.summary: Detects Certipy execution, a tool for Active Directory Certificate Services enumeration and abuse based on PE metadata characteristics and common command line arguments.
